name: Larry WALLS, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee

parties: Larry WALLS, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of June, 2014, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Laura J. Neal, PA Department of Corrections, for Department of Corrections.
casebody.head_matter:
93 A.3d 817
Larry WALLS, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 16, 2014.
Larry Walls, pro se.
Laura J. Neal, PA Department of Corrections, for Department of Corrections.
